# Choropleth Mapping with R

## Installing packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tmap, tidyverse, rvest)
```

## Importing the Data into R

### Data Source

The two data is from [data.gov.sg](https://data.gov.sg/) and [Department of statistics, Singapore](https://www.singstat.gov.sg/). which has been download and read to use for geospatial analysis.

### Importing the Geospatial data into R

```{r}
mpsz <- st_read("K:/kalpitkulshrestha24/ISSS626/Hands-on_Exercise/Hands-on EX02/Data/Geospatial/MasterPlan2019SubzoneBoundaryNoSeaKML.kml")
```
